dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: What brings you to this forsaken land?

dialogues.speaker: Stranger
dialogues.text: I seek the ancient ruins, rumored to hold secrets of a long-lost civilization.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: ... and you should watch your step. The ruins can be deceptive."

dialogues.speaker: Stranger
dialogues.text: I've prepared myself for such dangers. But have you encountered any... strange creatures in this land?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I've seen them myself. Their presence is definitely ominous."

dialogues.speaker: Stranger
dialogues.text: The Shadowborn, yes. Their true nature is shrouded in mystery. Any insights you may have would be invaluable.
